entries.meaning: (obsolete, card games) The winning of the majority of tricks in the game of ombre.
examples: The Knave of Diamonds tries his wily Arts,and wins (oh shameful Chance!) the Queen of HeartsAt this, the Blood the Virgin's Cheek forsook,A livid Paleness spreads o'er all her Look;She sees, and trembles at th' approaching Ill,Just in the Jaws of Ruin, and Codille.
